feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.49.1: Account Locking & Cookie Security
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Login: Lock accounts after 10 failed attempts (#2806) @pglombardo
  • Passphrase: Increase cookie security (#2805) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2807) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.11 to 0.5.12 (#2818) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1013.0 to 1.1014.0 (#2817) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.36.1 to 1.36.2 (#2816) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.3.0 to 2.3.1 (#2812) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.173.0 to 1.174.0 (#2813) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump puma from 6.4.3 to 6.5.0 (#2809) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.172.0 to 1.173.0 (#2804) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1011.0 to 1.1012.0 (#2803) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.25.1 to 5.25.2 (#2802) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.2.0 to 2.3.0 (#2801) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1010.0 to 1.1011.0 (#2800) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.49.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.49.3: Dependency, Security Updates & Latest Language Strings
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Preliminary: Set rel="no-prefetch" to block browser pre-fetch (#2854) @pglombardo
  • fix database service names in docker-compose-xx.yml (#2821) @ggruening

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2876) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump actionmailer from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2868) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump actionview from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2869) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activesupport from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2870) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activejob from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2872) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump activestorage from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2873) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rails from 7.2.2 to 7.2.2.1 (#2867) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1020.0 to 1.1021.0 (#2875) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-storage from 1.53.0 to 1.54.0 (#2874) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.42.1 to 1.43.0 (#2871) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard-performance from 1.5.0 to 1.6.0 (#2864) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop from 1.68.0 to 1.69.1 (#2859) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.17.0 to 1.17.1 (#2858) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1019.0 to 1.1020.0 (#2856) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1018.0 to 1.1019.0 (#2852) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.4.0 to 2.4.1 (#2848) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.8 to 1.17.0 (#2847) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.0.2 to 1.1.0 (#2846) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump googleauth from 1.11.2 to 1.12.0 (#2845) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1017.0 to 1.1018.0 (#2838) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.49.4: New Cloudflare Proxy Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • New Cloudflare Setting: Optionally fetch CF IPs on container boot. (#2878) @pglombardo
  • Special fix for Mariadb (#2877) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.17.1 to 1.17.2 (#2885) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump irb from 1.14.1 to 1.14.2 (#2882) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop from 1.69.1 to 1.69.2 (#2883) @dependabot

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1021.0 to 1.1022.0 (#2879) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.50.0: Overhauled & Updated CSS Build System
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This should be a transparent release for end users besides some bug fixes related to dark mode.

:rocket: Features

  • CSS/JS: Updated build system and theme selection (#2904) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump helm/kind-action from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0 (#2901) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.3.9 to 3.4.0 (#2895) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.12 to 0.6.0 (#2898) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump timeout from 0.4.2 to 0.4.3 (#2900) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.5.1 to 0.5.2 (#2899) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.9.0 to 6.9.1 (#2897) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump securerandom from 0.4.0 to 0.4.1 (#2896) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump debase from 0.2.7 to 0.2.8 (#2894) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump oj from 3.16.7 to 3.16.8 (#2893) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1022.0 to 1.1023.0 (#2892) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.36.2 to 1.37.0 (#2891) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.48.0 to 0.49.0 (#2890) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump ruby-debug-ide from 0.7.3 to 0.7.4 (#2888) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.8.1 to 6.9.0 (#2889) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

..and go to http://localhost:5100
